title: FS  T206's in varying condition reduced price on last 8
author: Phillies*phan

posts.post_title: FS  T206's in varying condition reduced price on last 8
posts.post_content:
I have 8 cards for sale.  Going to sell them as a lot of 8. As singles they come to $181 but the lot price is $140. The 8 card lot is the bottom picture minus the Baker and Huggins cards.  Prefer Paypal gift.

Fiene  light crease  $35
Engle couple creases $25
Wright beater         $12
Lake one crease     $25
Lavender light stain on back $40
Howell stamped back  $17
Krause clipped corners  $15
Ford  ink and paper loss  $12
doyle, isbell, wright, phelan, criss, meyers, dessau, and perdue.
pm sent, interested in a few
Ill take the Schaefer beater $12. If its still available. Thanks
Selling the last ten as a group with a discount.  Thanks to the buyers.  You guys make selling cards easy.
another PM sent on Huggins. I ll take it ...
